DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will assess predictors of early on-treatment and sustained virological response in treatment-naïve patients with chronic hepatitis C initiated on treatment with Pegasys (peginterferon alfa-2a) or peginterferon alfa-2b and ribavirin. Data will be collected during the treatment period (24 or 48 weeks) and 12 and 24 weeks after the end of treatment. Target sample size is <2000.
DOC.brief_title: PROPHESYS 3: Observational Study on Predictors of Response in Patients With Treatment-naïve Chronic Hepatitis C Initiated on Treatment With Pegasys (Peginterferon Alfa-2a) or Peginterferon-alfa-2b
DOC.criteria: adult patients, >/= 18 years of age chronic hepatitis C HIV HCV coinfection allowed informed consent to data collection coinfection with Hepatitis B Virus (HBV) previous treatment with peginterferon and/or ribavirin
